prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I ordered a dress that looked stunning online, but it arrived wrinkled and nothing like the picture.  
The food was cold, and the waiter seemed annoyed when we asked for a drink refill.  
I can't believe I waited an hour for my order, only to receive the wrong item.  
This app crashes every time I try to log in, making it completely useless.  
I canceled my subscription but was still charged this month—extremely frustrating!  
The customer service rep was rude and unhelpful when I asked about my missing package.  
I was really looking forward to the event, but it was poorly organized and a waste of time.  
I found the website confusing and ended up ordering the wrong product; very disappointing.  
The hotel room was dirty, and the staff didn't seem to care when I reported it.  
I expected more from this brand, but the quality of the shoes has really gone downhill.  
The airline lost my luggage, and no one at the desk seemed to know how to help.  
I tried to return a faulty item, but they made the process unnecessarily complicated.  
The service was slow, and my meal took forever to arrive; not what I expected.  
I feel like I was misled by the advertisements—this product does not work as promised.  
My delivery was a day late, and the tracking system was not helpful at all.  
I have reached out multiple times about my issue, and I keep getting vague responses.  
The experience was underwhelming; I expected a lot more based on the reviews.  
I ordered a custom cake for my son's birthday, and it looked nothing like the picture I sent.  
The app is full of bugs, and it's frustrating trying to navigate it.  
I was very disappointed with how my complaint was handled; it felt dismissive.  
The food was overpriced for what you get; I won't be coming back.  
The staff seemed disinterested and barely acknowledged us during our visit.  
My subscription auto-renewed without my consent, and now I'm stuck with it.  
I waited for an hour for my table, only to find out they forgot about my reservation.  
The product broke after just a week of use; I expected better quality.  
I tried to get assistance, but the help desk was completely useless.  
The ambiance was nice, but the service was lacking; it ruined the evening.  
I was really excited to try this service, but it has been nothing but problems.  
The item I received was damaged, and the return process is a headache.  
I followed the instructions, but the gadget still doesn't work; very frustrating.  
The online chat support took too long to respond and didn't resolve my issue.  
I was disappointed with how my feedback was ignored after my last visit.  
The event was poorly promoted; I almost missed it entirely.  
I didn't appreciate being charged extra fees that weren't disclosed upfront.  
The quality of the food has declined; it tasted bland and unappetizing.  
The hotel promised amenities that weren't available upon arrival; very misleading.  
The checkout process was confusing, and I ended up paying more than I intended.  
The staff didn't seem trained to handle customer inquiries effectively.

The tour was not worth the money; it felt rushed and unorganized.

I feel like my loyalty as a customer doesn't matter; service has really dropped.  
I had high hopes for this product, but it failed to meet even my basic expectations.  
The website kept crashing while I was trying to place my order; incredibly frustrating.  
The food was bland, and the portions were small for the price we paid.  
I expected better customer support; I felt like I was talking to a robot.  
The hotel room was noisy, and I could hardly sleep during my stay.  
I was given incorrect information about my flight, which caused a lot of stress.  
The subscription promised free shipping, but I was charged anyway; misleading.  
I tried to resolve my issue online, but it was a complete dead end.  
The coffee shop was out of my favorite drink, which was a huge letdown.
